name: 七人杀阵 - Seven Sacrifices
description: Seven girls came to a mountain villa on the outskirts to attend a party. Suddenly they were struck by a storm. They were trapped and lost contact with the outside world.Everyone was caught unawares by the accident, but the conspiracy has just begun.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: Inter Core I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX650 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Inter Core I7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
